p: To identify the RNAs expressed in BVDV-infected MDBK cells, two cDNA libraries (C group: mock-infected MDBK cells group; E group: BVDV-infected MDBK cells group) were constructed. Each group was tested using three biological replicates. A highly stringent filtering pipeline was used to remove uncharacterized transcripts from the downstream analysis in RNA-seq. The workflow for the transcript analysis is shown in Figure 1(a). The final library was subjected to sequencing by Illumina HiSeq TM 4000. A total of 78,886,865,100 raw reads were generated in all libraries. After discarding the adaptor sequences, ribosomal RNAs, and low-quality reads, we obtained 519,821,014 clean reads, which were aligned to the reference genome of the species using the alignment software Tophat2 (2.1.1).
